titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that a National Hispanic-serving Institutions Week should be established, and commemorating the 25th anniversary of the Hispanic Association of Colleges and Universities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 9/15/2011--Introduced. Recognizes the achievements and goals of Hispanic-serving Institutions across this country. Congratulates the Hispanic Association of Colleges and Universities on its 25th anniversary and recognizes its achievements and goals. Supports the designation and recognition of National Hispanic-serving Institutions Week.
